### Change Type


<!-- ❗ Please select a 'Type' label ❗️ -->

- [ ] `feature` — New feature
- [ ] `improvement` — Product improvement
- [ ] `api` — API change
- [ ] `bugfix` — Bug fix
- [ ] `other` — Changes that don't affect SDK users, e.g. internal or .com changes
